          <title>
            <string language="en">Carbon radioactive decay</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioaktiver Zerfall des Carbons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaiblissement radioactif de carbone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deterioração radioativa do carbono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Deperimento radioattivo del carbonio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιενεργός αποσύνθεση άνθρακα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Decaimiento radiactivo del carbón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the radioactive decay of carbon-14, splitting into a beta particle and nitrogen-14.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>

          <structure>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht den radioaktiven 
Zerfall von Karbon-14 und spaltet in einen Betapartikel und in ein 
nitrogen-14 auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre l'affaiblissement radioactif
du carbone-14, coupant en bêta particule et nitrogen-14.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a deterioração radioativa 
do carbono-14, rachando em uma partícula beta e em um nitrogen-14.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra il decadimento radioattivo 
del carbonio-14, dividendo in beta particella e nitrogen-14.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τη ραδιενεργό αποσύνθεση 
carbon-14, που χωρίζει σε ένα βήτα μόριο και άζωτο- 14.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra el decaimiento radiactivo 
del carbono-14, partiendo en una partícula beta y un nitrogen-14.</string>
          </description>
